snippet: Two months ago Hayley Parker-Barker and her husband introduced their boys' clothing line, Culdesac, on the Web, which allowed them to combine their skills and, as well, to significantly lower their learning curve.
abstract: Two months ago Hayley Parker-Barker and her husband introduced their boys' clothing line, Culdesac, on the Web, which allowed them to combine their skills and, as well, to significantly lower their learning curve.
lead_paragraph: When I first met Hayley Parker-Barker, in 2007, she was just Hayley Parker, a sweet, level-headed senior at F.I.T. and an intern at Narciso Rodriguez. She acquired Barker when she married her husband, Cameron, whom she has known since they were toddlers. And now they have a child of their own, Ender, and live near Salt Lake City, where Cameron is studying computer programming.
